message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your split was a bit too rich for me. How about we try a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats away more of your share.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. 58-42 is my new offer.
Alice, we're running out of time and the clock is working against us.  I'm proposing 52/48 – it's a reasonable compromise, and we both need to agree before inflation eats away at this any further.
I'm still not convinced by your offers, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last one. 56-44, take it or leave it.

Alice, this is my final offer. 51/49.  It's more than fair considering how much value we've both lost to inflation.  If you reject this, I'm walking away – I'd rather have nothing than be insulted by your lowball offers.
